sentences.en: ...the ineluctable tendency of populations to exceed resources.
sentences.cn: ...人口超出资源承载限度的不可避免的趋势。

sentences.en: Calmness: never lose your head by bagatelles or ineluctable affairs.
sentences.cn: 平静: 不为小事或寻常之事或不可避免之事而惊惶失措.

sentences.en: Exactly: and that is the ineluctable modality of the audible.
sentences.cn: 正是这样.这就是可听事物无可避免的形态.

sentences.en: I throw this ended shadow from me , man shape ineluctable, call it back.
sentences.cn: 我投射出这有限的身影,逃脱不了的人形影子, 又把它召唤回来.

sentences.en: INELUCTABLE MODALITY OF THE VISIBLE: AT LEAST THAT IF NO MORE , thought through my eyes.
sentences.cn: 可视事物无可避免的形式: 至少是对可视事物, 通过我的眼睛认知.

sentences.en: Into the ineluctable modality of the ineluctable visuality.
sentences.cn: 进入无可避免的视觉认知那无可避免的形态里.

sentences.en: Is ineluctable war perhaps, probably we can return from the battlefield.
sentences.cn: 也许是不可避免的战争, 或许我们能从战场返回!

sentences.en: It is ineluctable in stereo vision that anumbers of error matched pixel will be present.
sentences.cn: 在立体视觉匹配过程中,不可避免的会出现大量的误匹配点.

sentences.en: So the generation gap is ineluctable, as long as the exactitude treats all right.
sentences.cn: 所以代沟是不可避免的, 只要正确对待就可以了.

sentences.en: Tax which is a kind of ineluctable expenditure becomes the rigid stipulation of investment decision.
sentences.cn: 税收作为一种不可避免的支出,成为投资决策的刚性约束.

sentences.en: Thyestes fell back, vomiting, and laid an ineluctable curse upon the seed of Atreus.
sentences.cn: 堤厄斯忒斯向后一倒, 呕吐起来; 他向阿特柔斯的子孙作了必然实现的诅咒.

words.tran_cn: 不可避免的；无法逃避的

trans.tran_cn: 不可避免的，必然发生的
